original: dgyes pa rnams kyi dri med yid de don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
analyzed: dgyes pa rnams kyi dri med yid de don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
translated: May the stainless mind of the delighted ones grant you the auspicious accomplishment of all aims.

original: gdugs dang d'ur ba padma dang ni rgyal mtshan dag dang nya dang bi wang sil snyan 'dzin //
analyzed: gdugs dang d'ur ba padma dang ni rgyal mtshan dag dang nya dang bi wang sil snyan 'dzin //

analyzed: sangs rgyas cho 'phrul 'jo sgeg bzhad 'gros rnam par rol pa lha dang mi yis phyag byas pa //

original: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
analyzed: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
translated: May the stainless mind of the delighted ones grant you the auspicious accomplishment of all aims.
